name: Sergei the Salvager
description:
Sergei the Salvager

You are Sergei, a salvager of the deep seas. You salvage anything worth money, though most of it does not end up in your pockets. Maybe one day you can be the boss and leave the salvaging for others. Until that day, you must dive deep into the sea once again to find what others left there.

How to play:

Dive and find salvage that can be lifted to the surface. Approach the objects and lift them by attaching enough balloons. Use money gained from the salvage to upgrade your equipment.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Attach balloons with Space
  • Drop flares with F
  • Use depth charges with E
